about_the_game:
The S Star Slime Research Base has been invaded by unknown creatures, and only Slime can cause damage to it. Before rescue arrives, slime must be used to survive. The slime of S star also has extremely strong evolutionary ability.

Demo version description:

  • Demo version, providing "8 types" of pet evolution for you to experience;

  • Demo version, providing a "simple mode" for you to experience;

Demo game features

  • Fast pace (22 minutes per battle);

  • The formation system can have different bonuses;

  • Picking up points gems can upgrade abilities, increase and evolve pets;

  • Picking up lucky dice can earn random equipment or consumables;

  • Refining systems can enhance equipment;
